リム転移に用いる便利な転送器です

レスタニア各地に点在し、触れて《リム》を

new:
<COL ffdc78>The "Portcrystal"</COL> is a convenient transporter used for Rift Teleport, similar to the Dragon's Keystone.

They are scattered throughout Lestania and by consuming Rift Crystals, you can instantly travel to distant Portcrystals.

old:
<COL ffdc78>よく使う拠点は《マイ拠点》に登録しましょう</COL>

マイ拠点に登録した礎はリムが減額されるほか
ゲームメニューの《リム転移》からも
行き先として選べます

リム転移とマイ拠点登録を利用すれば
冒険はより快適になります
new:
<COL ffdc78>Register your most frequently used locations in "Favorites"</COL>

The Portcrystals registered in "My Locations" will receive a rim discount and can also be selected as destinations from "Rift Teleport" in the game menu.

Rift Teleport and Favorites will make your adventures more pleasant!

old:

new:
However, the only Rift Crystals that can be chosen as the destination for Rift Teleport are the ones that have been visited and put into a "Released State." 
In general, you can release them just by touching them, but there are also some crystals that require specific conditions to be cleared.
